clusterlockutility.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * @package kata
00004  */
00005 
00006 
00007 
00008 
00009 /**
00010  * CLUSTERwide locking mechanism with timeout for critical sections or eventhandlers
00011  * (needs memcached)
00012  *
00013  * @package kata_utility
00014  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00015  */
00016 class ClusterlockUtility {
00017     /**
00018      * @var integer seconds to wait until we timeout
00019      */
00020     private $timeout= 10;
00021 
00022     /**
00023      * @var array holds lock-status
00024      */
00025     private $locks= array ();
00026 
00027     /**
00028      * placeholder for cache-utility
00029      */
00030     private $cacheUtil = null;
00031 
00032     /**
00033      * @param integer $timout how many seconds to wait for a lock before we fail
00034      */
00035     public function setTimeout($timeout) {
00036         if (is_numeric($timeout) && ($timeout > 0)) {
00037             $this->timeout= $timeout;
00038             return true;
00039         }
00040         return false;
00041     }
00042 
00043     /**
00044      * initialize internal structures
00045      */
00046     protected function initialize() {
00047         if (!defined('MEMCACHED_SERVERS') || (strlen(MEMCACHED_SERVERS)==0)) {
00048             throw new RuntimeException('clusterlockutil: no memcached-servers defined in config');
00049         }
00050 
00051         if (null === $this->cacheUtil) {
00052             $this->cacheUtil = getUtil('Cache');
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00056     /**
00057      * Lock a (user?) id
00058      *
00059      * @param int $id, id of the user to lock.
00060      * @param bool $waitForTimeout, wait for time out
00061      * @return bool, returns true if the user was locked
00062      * @uses CacheUtility::add
00063      */
00064     function lock($id, $waitForTimeout= true) {
00065         $this->initialize();
00066 
00067         $timeout= time() + $this->timeout;
00068         $lockId= CACHE_IDENTIFIER.'clusterLockUtilHandle'.urlencode($id);
00069         $success = false;
00070 
00071         while ((time() < $timeout) && $waitForTimeout) {
00072             if ($this->cacheUtil->add($lockId,1,$this->timeout,CacheUtility::CM_MEMCACHE)) {
00073                 $success = true;
00074                 break;
00075             }
00076             usleep(100000);
00077         }
00078 
00079         if ($success) {
00080             $this->locks[$id]= true;
00081             return true;
00082         }
00083 
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086 
00087     /**
00088      * Unlock a (user?) id
00089      *
00090      * @param int $id, id of the user to lock
00091      * @return true if the user was unlocked
00092      * @uses CacheUtility::write
00093      */
00094     function unlock($id) {
00095         if (!isset($this->locks[$id])) {
00096             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00097                 throw new Exception("user $userid not locked");
00098             }
00099             return false;
00100         }
00101 
00102         $lockId = CACHE_IDENTIFIER.'clusterLockUtilHandle'.urlencode($id);
00103         $this->cacheUtil->write($lockId,false,1,CacheUtility::CM_MEMCACHE);
00104         unset ($this->locks[$id]);
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     function __destruct() {
00109         if (count($this->locks) > 0) {
00110             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00111                 throw new Exception("these locks have not been unlocked:".print_r($this->locks, true));
00112             }
00113         }
00114     }
00115 
00116 }
